name: Draft Horse
description: A sturdy and robust horse for pulling carts, ploughs, or wagons.

name: Riding Horse
description: A horse suitable for riding long distances. Accustomed to carts and carriages.

name: War Horse
description: Thoroughbred, accustomed to combat, and tempered for excitement. Capable of bearing two riders and galloping at high speeds.

name: Camel
description: A beast of burden, superior to the horse in rocky, barren, and arid climates.

name: Elephant
description: Incredibly powerful and majestic. Able to manipulate heavy objects with its trunk.

name: Cat
description: A domesticated cat, excellent at tracking and hunting small animals.

name: Parrot
description: A colorful bird able to mimic human speech. Those purchased from sailors often possess a colorful vocabulary.

name: Monkey
description: A small monkey likely imported from a faroff land. Able to obey simple commands, and in extremely rare cases, cast simple spells.

name: Deer
description: A forest-dwelling quadruped with a skittish demeanor. Too weak capable of carrying riders, and rarely domesticated.

name: Bear
description: A mighty animal with a thick hide and a prodigious horn. Fearsome and tamable only via magic.

name: Rhinoceros
description: A mighty animal with a thick hide and a prodigious horn. Fearsome and tamable only via magic.
